title: Open your eyes = Abre los ojos
creator_credit: Alejandro Amenabar, Jose Luis Cuerda, Fernando Bovaira, Sociedad General de Television SA, Lucky Red, Les Films Alain Sarde and Producciones del Escorpión S.L.
brief_description: Cesar (Eduardo Noriega) is a very handsome young man and an heir to a huge family fortune. At a party he meets Sofia (Penelope Cruz) and for the first time in his life, he feels love. However, his jealous girlfriend causes a horrific accident which leaves Cesar mutilated, his once beautiful face now disfigured. Furthermore, the accident seems to have thrown Cesar into a nightmare world in which he is accused of murder and one from which he is unable to escape. Told in flashback by Cesar who is being held in a prison for the mentally insane, “Open your eyes” is by turns a horror film, a love story, and a metaphysical puzzle which plays with our notions of beauty, faith and truth. Cameron Crowe remade “Open your eyes” as the Hollywood film, “Vanilla sky”. In Spanish with English subtitles.
